resources.string: "You can back up and synchronise your writing style to ensure the same keyboard experience across all your Xperia™ devices, both present and future. Activate automatic backup and sync?"
Additional charges may apply for downloading.
"Dictionary is missing for %1$s. Without a dictionary you won't see any word suggestions for this language except for words you have written yourself."
The dictionaries for your languages have not been downloaded. Please connect to the network or Wi-Fi to download them.
To personalise the keyboard later, go to Xperia™ keyboard settings.
To further personalise the keyboard, for example to change the keyboard skin, visit Xperia™ keyboard settings.
Tip! You can enter punctuation marks without having to delete the space first.
All of your personal writing style data will be deleted
Get emoji suggestions when typing, for example a cloud emoji if you type cloud
Log in to learn from Gmail™
Tap space bar twice for full stop followed by space
